body:
I ran `spack install` with my `spack.yaml` that only includes `cmake` to install `cmake`, but this fails because one of the dependencies of `cmake` is `perl`, which is dependent on `patch`, a package that is not listed as implicit dependency.

### Steps to reproduce the issue
```console
$ vim spack.yaml
```
with the spack.yaml looking like
```
spack:
  specs:
  - cmake
```
then run
```console
$ spack concretize -f
$ spack install
```
